ARABIC: ذَٰلِكَ جَزَآؤُهُمْ جَهَنَّمُ بِمَا كَفَرُوا۟ وَٱتَّخَذُوٓا۟ ءَايَٰتِى وَرُسُلِى هُزُوًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: That is their repayment - Hell - because they were kafir and made a mockery of My Signs and of My
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Their requital will be Hell, because they disbelieved and mocked My signs and messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Hell is their recompense for disbelieving and their taking My revelations and My Messengers as objects of jest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: For their disbelief and their mocking Our revelations and Messengerss, their recompense will be hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This is their reward – hell – because they disbelieved, and made a mockery of My verses and My Noble Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: That shall be their recompense, Hell; because they disbelieved and took My Ayat and My Messengers for jest."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Thus it is that their recompense is hell, because they disbelieved and held My communications and My apostles in mockery.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: That is their recompense -- Gehenna for that they were unbelievers and took My signs and My messengers in mockery.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: That is their reward: hell, because they disbelieved, and made a jest of Our revelations and Our messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Hell will be their reward, because they denied the truth, and made a jest of My signs and My messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: That shall be their meed--Hell-for they disbelieved and held My revelations and My apostles in mockery.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: That is their requital—hell—because of their unfaith and for deriding My signs and apostles.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: That is their reward, Hell, because they rejected Faith, and took My Signs and My Messengers by way of jest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: That shall be their recompense, Hell; because they disbelieved and took My Ayat (proofs, evidences, verses, lessons, signs, revelations, etc.) and My Messengers by way of jest and mockery.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Gehenna is their recompense; because they disbelieved and mocked My verses, and My Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: That is their requital—Hell—on account of their disbelief, and their taking My revelations and My messengers in mockery.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: That is their recompense - Hell - for what they denied and [because] they took My signs and My messengers in ridicule.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [18:106] That, namely, the matter which I [God] have mentioned concerning the failure of their deeds and so on (dhālika, ‘that’, constitutes the subject) is their requital — Hell — because they disbelieved and took My signs and My messengers in mockery, that is to say, [taking] both of them as something to be derided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (That is their reward: hell, because they disbelieved) in Muhammad (pbuh) and in the Qur'an, (and made a jest) and mockery (of Our revelations) Our Scripture (and Our messengers) Muhammad (pbuh) and others.
